title: Lunar Morgana Skin
body: I bought Lunar Morgana skin the day before 6.2 released. When it updated it acted like i didn't purchase the skin and still kept the 950 RP.  Didn't see it in common problems so I posted here.

replies.body: It's priced at 975. PBE price 1350RP was subject to change. But it still is at a good price for 975RP and a legacy skin.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Legacy or not, I only got the Cait skin. The Morg skin looks way better than the initial pre-release PBE images made it look but I still can't get behind the color scheme.
Correct! Was off top of my head. Either way it acts like i never purchased it :P
I'd put in a support ticket
thats what i didnt know. thanks
Maybe I'll get to see u in action bro

Yes, please shoot us a ticket so we can take a look at your account and see what happened! The content shouldn't have unlocked before 6.2, which may be where the problem lies. We'll be able to fix this and get the content unlocked for you. 

[Here's the support ticket link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you still need it!
I don't like the dress too much . . . it looks so pretty in the splash art. It is still a great skin. :D
I got both the cait and morg cause they're legacy and look feisty! {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} Wish they would release one for jinx too. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Jinx already has a Lunar Revel skin from last year.
